name: Sneha Parui
greetingText: I really like your name btw! {Paruiii}
wishText: May the love of all the dogs always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah blah...
text4: Cause I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, I really hope you liked it.
replayText: If not and yet you want to watch it again, click here.
